Method Detail

addMenuOption

public void addMenuOption(MenuOption option)
Adds a menu option that the user can select. This method does not check for duplicate choices/options

Parameters:
option - the option object to add to the possible choices

clear

public void clear()
Removes all current menu options for this menu

clearWhenMenuIsPrinted

public void clearWhenMenuIsPrinted(boolean value)
used to turn on/off the clear terminal when the meneu is printed

getUserChoice

public MenuOption getUserChoice()
Prints all the choices to the user and gets a valid choice from the user.

Returns:
the selected option (based upon the options that have been given to the user)

getUserChoice

public MenuOption getUserChoice(String header)
Prints all the choices to the user and gets a valid choice from the user.

Parameters:
header - the message to display above the menu
Returns:
the selected option (based upon the options that have been given to the user)
